pullrequest.title: Test loading all example config files

content.raw:
I get these msgs when running the Example test:

~~~
[GUI] [Err] [Iface.cc:508] Failed to load plugin [hello_plugin] : couldn't find shared library
~~~

Are these expected? I tried reverting a few plugin filenames back to `libhello_plugin.so` and the tests still pass. 

Is the idea of this PR to use a new convention for specifying plugin filenames?
content.html:
I get these msgs when running the Example test:

[GUI] [Err] [Iface.cc:508] Failed to load plugin [hello_plugin] : couldn't find shared library

Are these expected? I tried reverting a few plugin filenames back to libhello_plugin.so and the tests still pass.

Is the idea of this PR to use a new convention for specifying plugin filenames?
